breakdowns.description: Enables users to add new tasks with a title, description, priority, due date, and tag; edit existing tasks; delete tasks; mark tasks as Completed or Pending; and assign tasks to events, including assigning multiple tasks to a single event.
conditions: A new task must include a title, description, priority, due date, and tag.
Tasks can be assigned to events.
Multiple tasks can be assigned to a single event.

breakdowns.description: Enables users to add events with a name, description, and location; edit existing events; delete events; mark events as archived; and have tasks assigned to events.
conditions: A new event must include a name, description, and location.
Events can have multiple tasks assigned to them.
